author: cnbc.com
title: Data I/O Corporation Announces Upcoming Investor Events
text:
REDMOND, Wash., April 04, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Data I/O Corporation (NASDAQ:DAIO), the leading global provider of advanced data and security programming and IP management solutions for flash-memory, flash based microcontrollers and other intelligent devices, today announced the following upcoming investor events:
AGC Partners' 14th Annual West Coast InfoSec & Broader Technology Growth Conference, April 16, 2018
Data I/O will be participating in AGC Partners' 14th Annual West Coast InfoSec & Broader Technology Growth Conference on April 16, 2018, in San Francisco at The Hilton Union Square Hotel. The AGC conference is being held in parallel with the RSA Conference 2018, an event that provides an annual platform to connect over 45,000 attendees with ideas and cutting-edge technology to safeguard the digital world against cyber threats. One-on-one meetings for Data I/O management with institutional investment firms and industry analysts will be scheduled at the AGC conference throughout the day.
The investor presentation used at the conference will be posted in the investor relations section of the Companyâ€™s website on the day of the event.
First Quarter Financial Results and Conference Call, April 26, 2018
The Company has scheduled a conference call to discuss financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018, on Thursday, April 26, 2018. Management will hold the conference call at 2 p.m. Pacific Time/5 p.m. Eastern Time. Data I/O Corporation will release the company's financial results after the market closes that same day.
To listen to the conference call, please dial (612) 234-9959, passcode: DAIO. A taped replay will be made available approximately one hour after the conclusion of the call and will remain available until May 10, 2018. To access the replay, please dial (320) 365-3844, access code 446996. The conference call will also be simultaneously webcast over the Internet; visit the News and Events section of the Data I/O Corporation website at www.dataio.com to access the call from the site. This webcast will be recorded and available for replay on the Data I/O Corporation website approximately one hour after the conclusion of the conference call.
About Data I/O Corporation
Since 1972 Data I/O has developed innovative solutions to enable the design and manufacture of electronic products for automotive, industrial/Internet-of-Things and consumer electronics markets and their programming center and contract manufacturing partners. Today, our customers manufacture hundreds of millions of products each year using Data I/O programming solutions to reliably, securely, and cost-effectively deliver their Intellectual Property into programmable devices. Our expertise in programmable integrated circuits, global supply chain processes, factory integration and IP management and protection helps bring innovative new products to life. These solutions are backed by a global network of Data I/O support and service providers, ensuring success for our customers.
Learn more at www.dataio.com .
Joel Hatlen Darrow Associates, Inc. Chief Operating and Financial Officer Jordan Darrow Data I/O Corporation
